title: Blake Lively will 'get lots of sleep' when she's dead and shares essentials from her baby registry
text:
She's a mother to three children and boasts an incredible acting career.

And Blake Lively shared a few products that keep her family going as she updated People with her Amazon baby registry essentials after recently welcoming a new little one into the family.

The 32-year-old actress may have a full house now, but she joked that things will calm down soon enough and she'll 'get lots of sleep' when she's dead.

Smart shopper: Blake Lively shared a few products that keep her family going as she updated People magazine with baby registry essentials after recently welcoming a new little one into the family; seen in May

Blake reminisced about her favorite times with her family and said that 'just sitting and telling stories together, drawing, building forts, dancing and picking up trash to protect their imaginary dolphin' were a few favorites in her home.

'All sounds cheesy, but it’s those simple moments I appreciate most,' she added. 'I plan to get lots of sleep when I’m dead.'

While awake and ready for the day ahead, she relied on various products from an on-going Amazon registry to keep everyone thriving.

Out and about: One of her must-haves is the mommy favorite Baby Jogger City Mini Double Stroller, a lightweight and durable, quick-fold option for moms on the go; seen in June with husband Ryan Reynolds and daughters Inez, three, and James, four

Whatever it takes! She's also a big fan of the Ergobaby Omni Carrier for easy baby-wearing and the Inglesina Fast Table Chair, a portable option allowing your little one to sit right in the action while eating out; seen in 2016

'Before I had my own kids, I asked all the parents I trusted most for a list of their "go-to" items,' she said. 'My registry is made of all those products plus ones that I’ve discovered myself over the years.'

One of her must-haves is the mommy favorite Baby Jogger City Mini Double Stroller, a lightweight and durable, quick-fold option for moms on the go.

She's also a big fan of the Ergobaby Omni Carrier for easy baby-wearing and the Inglesina Fast Table Chair, a portable option allowing your little one to sit right in the action while eating out.

'Before I had my own kids, I asked all the parents I trusted most for a list of their "go-to" items,' she said. 'My registry is made of all those products plus ones that I’ve discovered myself over the years'; seen in August

'The neat part is I actually keep this registry active for years, because it’s an easy way for me to reorder all our basics, and it’s also a great way to share my must-have list with my friends, as they did with me when I needed it,' she said. 'The baby registry is a community tool for me more than anything else.'

Blake and husband Ryan Reynolds also love Jessica Alba's Honest brand diapers, Welly Water Bottles, the Playtex Diaper Gene and the Philips Starry Night Monitor and Projector.

'I always hope to find items that are good for my babies and are also kind to the environment,' she said before nothing that reusable water bottles and cutlery make 'life so much easier because I’m much more prepared with snacks for my kids and myself.'
